properties.name: azure.text-analysis.uri
properties.description: URI endpoint for text analysis - should be the full URI, e.g. https://westeurope.api.cognitive.microsoft.com/text/analytics/v2.0/sentiment

properties.name: azure.text-analysis.language
properties.description: Language to assume for sentiment, e.g. en

properties.name: azure.text-analysis.subscription-key
properties.description: API subscription key obtained from the Azure portal
